ygData.subject: Re: Gnome quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I should also mention that level 25 people run in terror at the sight of Borxx. He casts spells that do over 200 dmg. Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA
ygData.messageBody:
I should also mention that level 25 people run in terror at the sight of
Borxx. He casts spells that do over 200 dmg.

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/

> -----Original Message-----
> From: King, Darrin [mailto:dking@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 11:36 AM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Gnome quest
>
>
> From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>
> Borxx is indeed a very very bad Evil Eye in Runnyeye. That's all
> I can tell
> you b/c I have not ever been foolish enough to cross his path! hehe
>
